text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/organization-role defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
provider Provider An organization that delivers care services (e.g. hospitals, clinics, community and social services, etc.).
agency Agency An organization such as a public health agency, community/social services provider, etc.
research Research An organization providing research-related services such as conducting research, recruiting research participants, analyzing data, etc.
payer Payer An organization providing reimbursement, payment, or related services
diagnostics Diagnostics An organization providing diagnostic testing/laboratory services
supplier Supplier An organization that provides medical supplies (e.g. medical devices, equipment, pharmaceutical products, etc.)
HIE/HIO HIE/HIO An organization that facilitates electronic clinical data exchange between entities
member Member A type of non-ownership relationship between entities (encompasses partnerships, collaboration, joint ventures, etc.)

name: OrganizationAffiliationRole
title: Organization Affiliation Role
description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the role of one Organization in relation to its affiliation with another.

concept.definition: An organization that delivers care services (e.g. hospitals, clinics, community and social services, etc.).
An organization such as a public health agency, community/social services provider, etc.
An organization providing research-related services such as conducting research, recruiting research participants, analyzing data, etc.
An organization providing reimbursement, payment, or related services
An organization providing diagnostic testing/laboratory services
An organization that provides medical supplies (e.g. medical devices, equipment, pharmaceutical products, etc.)
An organization that facilitates electronic clinical data exchange between entities
A type of non-ownership relationship between entities (encompasses partnerships, collaboration, joint ventures, etc.)
